events.name: Google Cloud Study Jam - Machine Learning
events.description:
ABSOLUTELY FREE WORKSHOP
** To confirm your seat please register here: https://bit.ly/35WFkA3

Join us for our upcoming Cloud Study Jam and get hands-on experience with Machine Learning.

After the Study Jam, you’ll receive 30-days free access to the entire Qwiklabs catalog, so you can keep developing your skills at home. Complete all of the labs in the session’s quest, and you’ll earn an additional free month of access to Qwiklabs as well as a badge for your online profile.

Individual attendees who complete the qualifying quest during the Study Jam will get exclusive Google Cloud stickers/pins and other swag items. Google swags for all attendees and special prize for the photo contest winner.

Bring a laptop and charger (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed. Don’t forget your charger.

Agenda:

4:30-5:00 Sign in
5:00 - 5:30 Welcome and signing into Qwiklabs
5:30 - 6:00 Lab 1: Cloud ML Engine: Qwik Start
6:00 - 6:15 : Break: Snack and socialize

6:15 -6:45 Lab 2: Cloud API Explorer: Qwik Start
6:45 - 7:00 : Break: Snack and socialize

7:00- 7:45 Lab 3: Image classification with AutoML vision
7:45 - 8:00 : Break: Snack and socialize

8:00 - 8:45 Lab 4: Image detection with Cloud Vision API
8:45 - 9:00: Prize giving and closing
9:00 - 9:30: Networking

You are welcome ANYTIME during the event.

When:
Friday, November 22, 4.30pm to 9.30pm

Where:
Sandbox Academy
#3265 – 3rd Floor, 4000 No.3 Rd
Richmond BC V6X 0J8
events.how_to_find_us: Enter to Aberdeen mall near Aberdeen Skytrain station. The event will held on the 3rd floor of the mall. Look for "Sandbox Academy" or store number "3265".

Bring a laptop and charger (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed. Don’t forget your charger.

events.name: Firebase Study Jam 2020
events.description:
ABSOLUTELY FREE ONLINE WORKSHOP

Join us for our upcoming Codelab and get hands-on experience with Firebase.

Keep a laptop and charger (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed. Don’t forget your charger.

Firebase is Google’s mobile app development platform for iOS, Android, and mobile web developers. Firebase gives you functionality like analytics, databases, messaging and crash reporting so you can move quickly and focus on your users.

Firebase Study Jams for Web are a great opportunity to bring members of your community together to learn how to develop web apps using some of Firebase's newly launched features for web development.

Agenda:
Codelab: .Get to know Firebase for Web
Build a web app from scratch with Firebase and Stackblitz's online editor. We'll be using basic HTML and JavaScript to talk to Firebase. This is a great intro to using the Firebase console and integrating Firebase into an app. No extensive prior knowledge or software installations needed.

When:
Tuesday, March 31, 7.00 pm to 9.00 pm

Where:
Youtube Live Streaming Link: https://youtu.be/iLUSeJhNk6E

events.name: [IWD] International Women's Day 2020 [Postpone for covid19]
events.description:
#TogetherWeRise

We’re inviting everyone to share their superpowers - those special qualities that make you shine. Whether you’re creating space for more voices to be heard or you’re working to secure funding as an entrepreneur, you’re a superhero in our book. Together let’s celebrate the super-women in our lives.

Remember, your superpower is anything that gives you the reason to live. From managing home to coding skills to writing blogs to public speaking - anything that makes you feel powerful and proud.

#TogetherWeRise.

events.name: Getting started with Augmented Reality
events.description:
ABSOLUTELY FREE ONLINE WORKSHOP

Join us for our upcoming workshop and get hands-on experience with Augmented Reality using ARCore.

Keep a laptop and charger (PC, Mac)! Make sure that you have Unity3D (https://unity.com/) installed on your computer.

We are going to develop a complete mobile AR app with the help of Unity and Google's ARCore Plugin. This workshop is suitable for any beginner to intermediate user of Unity.

AR is a hot cake of current technology trends. There is no better time than now to get your hand on this great new technology and keep up with the current trends. We are going to talk about how you can get started with the current AR SDKs(Specifically ARCore) with the help of a popular game engine, Unity. Combining the power of Google and Unity we are going to make our very first AR application which is gonna run both on Android and iOS.

Agenda:
1. Discovering ARCore with Unity.
2. Developing an AR Furniture app prototype with Unity and ARCore.
3. Building for both android and iOS

When:
Tuesday, March 1, 7.00 pm to 8.30 pm

Where:
Youtube Live Streaming Link: https://youtu.be/iLUSeJhNk6E

organizers.name: Procheta N.
organizers.bio: I am doing M.Sc at SFU with a passion for AI and Machine learning. I have hands-on experience in data mining, Web and Game design. Currently, working on real-time 3D AI virtual human with facial emotion and movement recognition, Unity3D & 3D modeling
